title: Loading screen stuck
body:
I am having trouble trying to get into a game after champion select it doesn't give me any error or anything it loads and gets stuck at loading screen with me being at 100% and i can hear the game going in the background as i can hear the menu coming up and pings happening in game but i can not get passed the loading screen i have multiple  fixes that others have given me and nothing works 
Please Riot

replies.body: Doesn't sound like a network issue if you've made it to the loading screen, so I'd say it's likely a hardware/settings/driver conflict somewhere.  Even if you haven't explicitly crashed, I'd go ahead and try the steps in the [Bug Splat and Game Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) article and see if they help.  Let me know!
